casebody.data:
In re SMS, a minor child EMS, a minor child.
appealed by Mother. No. 90P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Robert W. Ewing, Winston-Salem, for Melinda Kaye Bailey. Bradley K. Greenway, Rutherfordton, for Rutherford County DSS. K. Stacie Corbett, Charlotte, for Guardian Ad Litem.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st day of February 2006 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th day of June 2006."
